title: Best of The Herd: 08/02/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/02/2019
description:
Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin and says there is too many people talking about the difficulties of playing with LeBron to think that they're all wrong at this point. He thinks Ezekiel Elliott and Melvin Gordon are holding out because they know the RB market is only getting worse. Plus, Chris Broussard of FS1 has a heated discussion with Doug about LeBron's commitment and Carmelo Anthony deserving to stay in the league 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
